name: JAO

services.title: Server configuration
services.description: Configuration of environments, servers and web applications with Java, Angular, React, JQuery, Tomcat, Wildfly, JBoss, Weblogic...

services.title: Development
services.description: Programming with various Java frameworks such as Spring, Spring Cloud, Hibernate, JDBC, EJB, Jquery, Angular, React...

services.title: Web Design
services.description: I build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: Data Base
services.description: I work with different relational databases such as Oracle, SQL server, PostgresSql and non-relational databases such as MongoDB

services.title: Deploy
services.description: I have done deployments with different tools such as Firebase, Render, AWS, Jira, Bamboo, AnthillPro and manually

services.title: Version Controller
services.description: I have worked with SVN, Git... among other code version controllers

aboutpara:
üëãHi, I'm Juan Arana Olalde and I studied computer application development and computer systems administration along with different courses to complete my training.



 üõ§Ô∏èSince 2006 I have been participating in different Java and j2ee projects, carrying out fullstack tasks, development, analysis, requirements gathering, estimates, migrations, tests, deployments, incidents, dealing with clients...



 üéØMy goal is to develop my professional career in a project that allows me to grow while contributing my knowledge and experience.



 ‚ÑπÔ∏èIf you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact me on LinkedIn or email and I will clarify them for you.

resume.tagline: üëã  I'm a software engineer, product designer, and maker.
resume.description: I have worked in public and private companies participating in Java and J2EE projects. Knowledgeable in React, Javascript and most web frameworks.
